name:
Insight Edge - 

Instagram Suite
description: For my Digital Technology Immersion Practicum, my team and I worked with Meta's Instagram Product Manager to ideate and design a suite of tools called 'Insight Edge' to enhance the content creation process on Instagram.

name:
Prisoner Express App â€“ 

App Design & Prototyping
description: For my App Design & Prototyping course, I worked with the Prisoner Express client to conduct User Research, ideate on designs, and finally prototype the design into a PWA application for both Prisoners and Prisoner Express admins' use.

name:
CaptionCore - 

Designing Data Products
description: For my Designing Data Products course, under the guidance of the esteemed Lutz Finger, my team and I designed and developed a data product called 'CaptionCore' that helps companies generate brand-focused captions for Instagram posts using a Machine Learning model.

name:
Microsoft Course Registration System - 

MPS Project
description: For my Graduate MPS Project, I worked with Microsoft client to conduct User Research, brainstorm & design, and then Prototype a Course Registration website to showcase Microsoft Azure Database's capabilities.

name:
BeautyAI - 

Human Computer Interaction Project
description: For my Human Computer Interaction course, I conducted User Research, Designed & Prototyped on Figma, and conducted Usability Testing for a BeautyAI app that helps users find the right beauty products for their varied and unique skin tones, shades, and facial compositions.

name:
Swift Songs Decoded - 

Interactive Information Visualization
description: For my Interactive Information Visualization project, I decided to create a visualization on Taylor Swift's songs to analyze each songs danceability, acousticness, energy and danceability, as well the colors mentioned in the song. I created this visualization using a Radar chart and Circular barplot, in D3.js.

name:
Under the Covers - 

Interactive Information Visualization
description: For my Interactive Information Visualization project, I explored Couples' Sleeping apart habits, reasons and preferences. This visualization was developed in D3.js and incorporated into an article themed after the famed Netflix show 'Bridgerton'.

name:
Portfolio - 

Sonia Sunil
description: For this Portfolio, I designed the layout, typography and colors on Figma and developed it in React utilizing PrimeReact and ReactSpring for animations.
